title: Nasus needs help
body:
I'm not a fan of straight buffing him, his gameplay isn't exactly healthy and his ancient design makes him really frustrating to deal with. But his winrate continues to go down each patch while having a low playrate, which tells you even people who main him are having a hard time having success with him. I've played him since s2, well over a thousand games on him and I honestly don't think he's ever felt worse. 

The game has probably just passed him by. Too much mobility, too easy to counter build, too immobile and too limited by his intentional weaknesses for his strengths to even shine. 

But I know when he's not good and he's not good right now. I would honestly think some help to give him the ability to deal with all this mobility would be great...

Nasus is not good right now.

I am also a Gold Nasus main. 

He received a soft-nerf with the mastery changes and has been relatively "average" or "below average" since.

The dip in his win rate may reflect the damage in the game, the prevalence of rylais on CC mages, the nerfing of teleport, and the rise or carry picks in the top lane?

I actually don't know, but I have noticed the dip in win rate recently. Maybe modest nerfs to items he frequently build have begun to make him slightly less effective.

We also see more mages being played since the mage update, and mages have forms of crowd control. Movement speed nerfs have probably indirectly hurt him.

Nasus needs two adjustments (and he has needed them since mastery system changed):

1. He needs better base and/or scaling health. He doesn't build many health items early and of the juggernauts ({{champion:122}} and {{champion:86}}) his health scales the worst.
2. He needs something that grants him tenacity. The buff to ghost has helped him, but there is so much CC in the game that with all the movement speed nerfs he is more liable to get hit than in the past. I think he should get marginal increasing tenacity based on Q stacks. Either that or increase his base movement speed. He needs something that ALLOWS him to gap close or do something against high CC comps. Even with {{item:3111}}, points in the resolve tree for tenacity, and {{item:2138}} he still is EASILY kited.

I feel like with Nasus I really have to outplay my opponents more often to cover up his weaknesses. And tenacity is a big problem for him.

I think all the Keystones don't really help Nasus either. SotA is probably the best one for him, but it takes too long to stack it for it to have game impact and Grasp is so much more effective with his early game. Too bad this talent has been nerfed and it doesn't scale very well.
